thread.title: The Rock is caught on camera SWEARING at Kevin Hart after co-star cracks joke at People's Choice Awards
thread.title_full: The Rock is caught on camera SWEARING at Kevin Hart after co-star cracks joke at People's Choice Awards

author: Zoe Shenton
title: The Rock is caught on camera SWEARING at Kevin Hart after co-star cracks joke at People's Choice Awards
text:
Get celebs   Thank you for subscribing!   
The Rock probably didn't expect to be captured on camera flipping the finger at co-star Kevin Hart tonight. 
The actor was caught in the act at Wednesday night's People's Choice Awards after Kevin collected an award from stage after winning Favourite Comedic Movie Actor for his role in Central Intelligence. 
During his speech, he couldn't resist taking a friendly swipe at The Rock. The Rock flips the bird live on air at the People's Choice Awards 2017 (Photo: People's Choice Awards) The Rock flips the bird live on air at the People's Choice Awards 2017 (Photo: People's Choice Awards) 
The Fast and Furious actor initially laughed it off but then followed it up with the cheeky gesture, no doubt assuming the cameras were no longer filming. 
The Rock then later scooped his own award for Favourite Premium Series Actor for his role on Ballers. 
On the night, a whopping 64 categories were up for grabs, with the main nominess including Captain America: Civil War, which topped the nods with seven. Read More Actor Kevin Hart accepts an award onstage (Photo: WireImage) 
While in TV, Grey's Anatomy led the nominations with five. 
The Great Indoors star Joel McHale hosted the annual bash which saw presenters like Jamie Chung, Jordana Brewster, and Wilmer Valderrama take to the stage. Like us on Facebook
